name: Hangman (itch) (Fonaps)
description:
Hangman with pirates is a fun twist on the classic hangman game. Try to beat Blackbeard by solving the secret words.

With our hangman game, you can learn new vocabulary and develop your language skills. Our game offers more than 5,000 secret words in hundreds of categories. There are three difficulty levels: easy, medium, and hard.

Hangman is a fun word puzzle game for all ages.

Hangman is currently available in American and British English, French, German, and Dutch. Soon we will add more languages.

📌 Features

• more than 5,000 secret hangman words in hundreds of categories
• 3 levels of difficulty: easy, medium and hard
• learn new vocabulary in different languages
• great graphics with funny animations
• beautiful background music
• completely free

✉️ Contact

We took great care in developing our hangman game. Please contact us if you have any suggestions to improve the game.
You can reach us at fonapsapps@gmail.com.
